long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ether ↔ Gwei ↔ Wei Converter

Effortlessly convert between Ether (ETH), Gwei, and Wei with this lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension. Designed for developers, blockchain enthusiasts, and crypto users, this tool simplifies Ethereum unit conversions in real time.

Features
- Real-Time Conversion: Enter a value in any field, and the other two fields update automatically.
- Copy to Clipboard: Quickly copy converted values with a single click.
- Modern Design: Clean, minimalistic interface with rounded corners and a visually appealing gradient background.

Why Choose This Extension?
- Save Time: No more manual calculations or searching for conversion tools online.
- Easy to Use: Simplified interface for seamless conversions.
- Lightweight: No external dependencies, ensuring fast and efficient performance.

How to Use
- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
- Enter a value in Ether (ETH), Gwei, or Wei—the other fields will instantly update.
- Use the clipboard button to copy results with a single click.

Who Is This For?

This extension is perfect for:
- Developers working on Ethereum-based dApps and smart contracts.
- Crypto Enthusiasts needing quick conversions for transactions.
- Blockchain Learners exploring Ethereum's unit system.

Privacy
This extension does not collect or share any user data. All calculations and features run locally on your browser.

Try the Ether ↔ Gwei ↔ Wei Converter today and simplify your Ethereum unit conversions!
